raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Tekēhu's Farewell
| icon           = poe2 plain_letter icon.png
| description    = A shaking hand penned this missive. The ink runs where fresh tears fell upon the parchment.

"Captain,

I am an artist crafted of water, not a killer chipped from stone. As I am not equal to serving on your <xg>crew</xg>, and you have fallen below deserving the blessing of Ngati's son, I say we are poorly suited to each other's company.

May the Wheel grind the memory of your deeds into oblivion. May you forget this life in your next. By mother Ngati, I pray that you find the peace you seek.

Farewell, my captain.

Tekēhu"
| added_in       = poe2
